From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: construír

Asturian

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

construir (first-person singular indicative present construyo, past participle construíu)

  1. alternative form of construyir

Further reading

[edit]
  • “construir”, in Diccionariu de la llingua asturiana [Dictionary of the Asturian Language] (in Asturian), 1ª edición, Academia de la Llingua Asturiana, 2000, →ISBN
  • Xosé Lluis García Arias (2002–2004), “construir”, in Diccionario general de la lengua asturiana [General Dictionary of the Asturian Language] (in Spanish), Editorial Prensa Asturiana, →ISBN

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin cōnstruere, with normal change of conjugation to -ir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [kuns.tɾuˈi]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [kons.tɾuˈi]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [kons.tɾuˈiɾ]
  • Audio (Catalonia):(file)

Verb

[edit]

construir (first-person singular present construeixo, first-person singular preterite construí, past participle construït)

  1. to build; to construct

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of construir (third conjugation, with -eix-)
infinitive construir
gerund construint
past participle masculine feminine
singular construït construïda
plural construïts construïdes
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present construeixo construeixes construeix construïm construïu construeixen
imperfect construïa construïes construïa construíem construíeu construïen
future construiré construiràs construirà construirem construireu construiran
preterite construí construïres construí construírem construíreu construïren
conditional construiria construiries construiria construiríem construiríeu construirien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present construeixi construeixis construeixi construïm construïu construeixin
imperfect construís construïssis construís construíssim construíssiu construïssin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — construeix construeixi construïm construïu construeixin
negative (no) — no construeixis no construeixi no construïm no construïu no construeixin

Related terms

[edit]
  • construcció
  • constructor
  • reconstruir

Further reading

[edit]
  • “construir”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “construir”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “construir” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “construir” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin cōnstruere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /kõs.tɾuˈi(ʁ)/ [kõs.tɾʊˈi(h)], (faster pronunciation) /kõsˈtɾwi(ʁ)/ [kõsˈtɾwi(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /kõs.tɾuˈi(ʁ)/ [kõs.tɾʊˈi(h)], (faster pronunciation) /kõsˈtɾwi(ʁ)/ [kõsˈtɾwi(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /kõs.tɾuˈi(ɾ)/ [kõs.tɾʊˈi(ɾ)], (faster pronunciation) /kõsˈtɾwi(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /kõʃ.tɾuˈi(ʁ)/ [kõʃ.tɾʊˈi(χ)], (faster pronunciation) /kõʃˈtɾwi(ʁ)/ [kõʃˈtɾwi(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /kõs.tɾuˈi(ɻ)/ [kõs.tɾʊˈi(ɻ)], (faster pronunciation) /kõsˈtɾwi(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /kõʃ.tɾuˈiɾ/, (faster pronunciation) /kõʃˈtɾwiɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /kõʃ.tɾuˈiɾ/, (faster pronunciation) /kõʃˈtɾwiɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /kõʃ.tɾuˈi.ɾi/, (faster pronunciation) /kõʃˈtɾwi.ɾi/

  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (Portugal (Porto)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: cons‧tru‧ir

Verb

[edit]

construir (first-person singular present construo, first-person singular preterite construí, past participle construído)

  1. to build
  2. to construct

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of construir (irregular) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person

Present construo constróis, construis constrói, construi construímos construís constroem, construem
Imperfect construía construías construía construíamos construíeis construíam
Preterite construí construíste construiu construímos construístes construíram
Pluperfect construíra construíras construíra construíramos construíreis construíram

Imperfect construísse construísses construísse construíssemos construísseis construíssem
Future construir construíres construir construirmos construirdes construírem
Imperative
Affirmative constrói, construi construa construamos construí construam
Negative (não) não construas não construa não construamos não construais não construam

Antonyms

[edit]
  • destruir

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin cōnstruere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /konsˈtɾwiɾ/ [kõnsˈt̪ɾwiɾ], /konstɾuˈiɾ/ [kõns.t̪ɾuˈiɾ]
  • Audio (Spain):(file)
  • Rhymes: -iɾ
  • Syllabification: cons‧truir, cons‧tru‧ir

Verb

[edit]

construir (first-person singular present construyo, first-person singular preterite construí, past participle construido)

  1. to build
    El año pasado, construyeron muchos apartamentos.
    They built a lot of apartments last year.
    • 2020, “Yóok 'ol kaab Maya”, performed by Cemican:
      Deja que la turquesa construya un templo azul
      Let the turquoise build a blue temple
  2. to construct

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of construir (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)

gerund construyendo
past participle masculine feminine
singular construido construida
plural construidos construidas

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

Antonyms

[edit]
  • deconstruir
  • destruir

Related terms

[edit]
